title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally via a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: sync & async clients, streaming, chat & embed endpoints, fully typed.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, chat and embeddings wrappers.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-model chats, admin panel, RAG uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama built on Retrofit; sync/async, streaming, POJO mapping.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, conversation history, keybindings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement via VS-Code extension.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter: FastAPI backend, Chroma vector store, Streamlit frontend, all via Docker.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to query Ollama models inside buffers; supports selection, templates, streaming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator & OllamaChatGenerator nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models, dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama chat & embed backends, admin widgets, REST endpoints via Django-Rest-Framework.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async HTTP client for Ollama with serde models and tokio streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands & threads.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run local LLM prompts on notes and generate content inside vault.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket-Mode to answer questions with Ollama models in channels/DM.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform provider to manage Ollama models and settings as code on remote hosts.

title: ollama-rustic
summary: Alternative Rust client focused on WASM compatibility for browser & serverless usage.
